metadata.title: CVE-2021-22144 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Elasticsearch versions before 7.13.3 and 6.8.17 an uncontrolledrecursion vulnerability that could lead to a denial of service attack wasidentified in the Elasticsearch Grok parser. A user with the ability tosubmit arbitrary queries to Elasticsearch could create a malicious Grokquery that will crash the Elasticsearch node.

criterions.comment: elasticsearch package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
